long: Noble Truth of the Cause of Suffering (dukkha-samudaya ariya-sacca)
Noble Truth of the Cessation of Suffering (dukkha-nirodha ariya-saccaṃ)
Moods of the mind (Arom kong git)
Six Principles of Cordiality (cha dhammā sārāṇīyā)
Fame and disrepute (yaso ca ayaso ca)
Blame and praise (nindā ca pasaṃsā ca)
